Are Disney and Crayola out of  brown ink?

19 Aug 2010
My daughter chose this colouring book that uses a kind of ‘revealing’ ink for a recent treat.

In this case, the ink revealed a slightly more caucasian Jasmine than we recall from the movie.

What gives?
